title: Service disruption due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 因轨道故障导致的服务中断

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train service from #TanahMerah to #Aljunied towards #JooKoon is now operating normally.
[EWL]UPDATE: Please expect additional 5mins travelling time from #TanahMerah to #Aljunied towards #JooKoon due to earlier track fault.
[EWL]UPDATE: Please expect additional 15mins travelling time from #TanahMerah to #Aljunied towards #JooKoon due to earlier track fault
[EWL]UPDATE: Please expect additional travelling 20mins travelling time from #TanahMerah to #Aljunied towards #JooKoon.
[EWL]UPDATE: Our engineer has cleared the fault near #PayaLebar but trains will be travelling at a slower speed due to congestion.
[EWL]UPDATE: Estimate 30 mins additional travelling time from #PasirRis to #Aljunied towards JooKoon due to track fault.
[EWL]UPDATE: Estimate 25 mins additional travelling time from #PasirRis to #Aljunied towards JooKoon due to track fault.
[EWL] UPDATE: Train service is still available on the East West line.
[EWL]UPDATE: Estimate 25 mins additional travelling time from #TanahMerah to #Aljunied towards JooKoon due to track fault.
[EWL]UPDATE: Train service is still available on the East West line.
[EWL]UPDATE: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #TanahMerah to #Aljunied towards JooKoon due to track fault.
[EWL]: Train service is still available on the East West line.
[EWL]: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time from #TanahMerah to #Aljunied towards JooKoon due to track fault.
